description: Havana Nova needs to require cinderclient 1.0.6, which contains the update_snapshot_status() API used by assisted snapshots, as well as migrate_volume_completion() for volume migration.
title: Require new python-cinderclient for Havana

comments.content:
Nova needs to require a version of cinderclient newer than 1.0.5, which will contain the update_snapshot_status() API used by assisted snapshots.

(This has not been released yet, presumably will be 1.0.6.)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~eharney

comments.content:
Latest version in global requirements is 1.0.5, is there a patch to update global-requirements for a 1.0.6 version of the cinderclient?

https://github.com/openstack/requirements/blob/master/global-requirements.txt#L66
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: global-requirements.txt now says python-cinderclient>=1.0.5 - so can we close this please?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v

comments.content:
I believe there is still a need to bump the requirement to 1.0.6 now that it has been released, for:

http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=0e4bd7f93b9b
http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/python-cinderclient/commit/?id=d7796ef73
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~eharney

comments.content: Looks like the g-r patch is in progress - https://review.openstack.org/#/c/50372/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v

comments.content: We may end up doing a havana-rc3.  If so, we can include this.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: stable/havana
Review: https://review.openstack.org/53175
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/53175
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/aba6c75d5b8031efd1ab837116981bc6e041e0b9
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    stable/havana

commit aba6c75d5b8031efd1ab837116981bc6e041e0b9
Author: Eric Harney <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Oct 22 13:23:45 2013 -0400

    Require python-cinderclient >= 1.0.6
    
    Havana Nova should require python-cinderclient 1.0.6, which includes
    support for features implemented in Havana and already being used by
    Nova.  (APIs for assisted snapshots, and volume migration.)
    
    (Landed in master in commit 831c7e6d.)
    
    Change-Id: Ie2efb90a6e8b985f9bb8f9604eedd84e0d8a8a45
    Closes-Bug: #1230925
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
